climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 😴Enjoy Sleeping - Cooling memory foam pillow can relieve your shoulder and neck pain, create balance between supportive and firmness, provide good support and improve sleep quality. Because of filling with premium gel memory foam, KUSNUG memory foam pillow molds to your head and neck as lying down and helps body maintain the perfect head, neck, and spine alignment while they snooze. You can enjoy every night's sleep with cooling pillows for sleeping

😴Adjustable Pillows - Unlike traditional down pillows, the shredded memory foam pillows features a YKK zippered inner and outer cover, you can ADD or REMOVE foam filling to suit your size, shape or sleep position, find the perfect comfort level and provide the ultimate sleeping experience. Perfect for side sleepers, back sleepers, stomach sleepers. Each Size Pillow comes with a FREE extra bag of fill!

😴Bamboo Rayon Pillows - Made of 80% Memory Foam & 20% down-alternative fiber, using 3D cooling goose down alternative fiber, and the cooling pillow cover provides breathability and softness, being cool to the touch and silky soft to really keep you cool. Both sides are breathable, you can enjoy cooling nights in summer with the cooling side and a soft feeling the rest of the time

😴Riskless & High Quality - All the fluffy bed pillows are certified with OEKO-TEX Standard that ensures textiles meet high safety and environmental standards instead of using recycled contaminated and unregulated materials to ensure the ultimate quality and safety Control. You can buy KUSNUG pillows with confidence

😴Warm Tips - Our pillows come vacuum sealed for shipping. when you open the package, please pat them fully to restore shape and wait 24 hours before using bamboo pillows for sleeping. The outer cover can be put directly into the washing machine and dryer. Easy to maintain and always looks new even after repeated washing

😴Warranty - We hope that you get the best nights sleep every night. We provide all our customers with the most top quality products so you can have a comfortable and healthy life. Please feel free to contact our service support team if you have any questions with our Pillows, and we will do everything to make you 100% satisfied with your purchase and provide you with a satisfactory experience

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KUSNUG Adjustable Cooling Bed Pillows The pillow gently guide your spine into a straight line and keep your neck and back properly aligned, so it support your head and neck at all angles, wake up feeling refreshed and energized in the morning. Whether you prefer soft or firm pillows, this cooling pillow will meet your need for sleeping.

Adjustable Bed Pillows Ergonomic Bed Pillow for All Position Sleepers The ergonomic shape designed to relieve neck and shoulder pain and muscle tension, for a better night's sleep.Neck Pillow curves and swerves just like your body to give those places the right shaped support and comfort. Customize your sleep position for the best sleep.Designed with a YKK zipper, so you can easily adjust the filling to your preferred firmness level.
Previous page Next page 1 Personalized Support 2 Adjustable Height 3 Premium Quality 4 Easy to Care

Are these pillows machine washable? Of course they are for machine wash. You also can wash the pillow cover. Is this soft plush, medium firm or just firm? It can actually be all three. It comes with extra foam that you can add for more firmness. It’s a great pillow! Should I buy pillow protector cases/covers for this pillow? You don’t have to buy pillow protector covers. There is a YKK zipper in the pillow cover and then a smaller YKK zipper on the pillow itself for the filling. How can I adjust the soft? Come with Extal Filling. You can adjust the soft by adding or removing to the memory foam inside the pillow. Are these pillows cool and supportive? Yes. Made of gel memory foam, This type of memory foam technology allows for a much more sensual and personal night of sleep. The memory foam provides support for the neck, shoulders, back, and head.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They were super comfortable and fluffed up fast after taking them out of the package! I love that they gave extra fluff so you can control the firmness of your pillow, highly recommend these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this pillow for a few reasons. It has the right amount of neck support and it's Comfy. It comes with additional fill if you need it extra firm. I usually like my pillow firm and I had other pillows that compressed, and I had to adjust in the middle of the night. This pillow doesn't have those issues, which is very helpful for my night's sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gotta love that pillow!
reviews.reviewText: I love my pillow! My husband stole my twin pillow..u do gotta give this a try! Buy them! Won't regret!😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect support for my shoulder and back.
reviews.reviewText: I had trouble sleeping after my reverse shoulder replacement and a Kyphoplasty for my back. This is the first time I’ve used a body pillow and am very satisfied. I can finally sleep through the night. It keeps my back, shoulder and head aligned as I sleep on my side. It has good support for my arm and knees.I placed the pillow on a bed and let it rest for 48 hours before I used it. It didn’t smell at all from the beginning and the pillow became heavier as it rested. I like the extra bag of filling and assume I’ll add it in the future due to settling.I would have rated it a 5 if a pillow case was included. I put one king and one queen size case on either end with an overlap and it seems to work ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This pillow was very comfy! I like that it comes with the foam to either make it more fluffy or less fluffy it has good head and neck support and back support
